title: Schedule a Client Kickoff Meeting
description: A project manager needs to schedule a kickoff meeting for a new project with the client and internal team.

tasks.description: Identify the required attendees from both the client and internal teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a list of all necessary participants.

tasks.description: Check the calendars of the internal team members to find a few potential meeting times.
Email the client with the proposed times to find one that works for them.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a clear and professional scheduling email.

tasks.description: Once a time is agreed upon, send a calendar invitation to all attendees with a meeting agenda.
